info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 10 at 10:42AM CDT until August 10 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues.
* WHERE...A portion of southwest Wisconsin, including the following county, Grant.
* WHEN...Until 100 PM CDT.
* IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Expect many areas of slow moving or standing water.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1033 AM CDT, emergency management reported ongoing flooding in Bagley due to debris keeping storm water from exiting flooded areas. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Flooding impacts will continue, but minimal additional rainfall is expected through early afternoon. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Boscobel, Muscoda, Wauzeka, Orion, Blue River, Bagley, Mount Hope, Patch Grove, Millville, Woodman, County Roads K And T, Werley, Highway 61 And County T, Port Andrew, Red Oak Ridge, Brodtville, Wyalusing State Park and Jellystone Park Near Bagley. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON
